comments.body: I'll submit this as-is and I have a second PR ready to go that const-anizes all Results, Commands, and SerializableFinders in this package.

I attempted to go down the rabbit hole to change all Result objects to be factory constructors, but gave up half-way through. On a lot of factory constructors I'd have to add "ignore: avoid_unused_constructor_parameters" since they ignore the json parameter. I do think we should keep that parameter to have a common interface for all Results. The ignore makes the code just harder to read for not much benefit. I'll keep this as is for now.
